section.title: The Find Financial Accounts screen.
section.para: This screen is used to locate existing financial accounts that have been created.
It also includes the option to use the 'Advanced Search' button to display additional fields that can be used to locate a specific financial account.
New Financial Accounts can be created using the 'Create New Financial Account' button.

section.title: How do locate an existing Financial Account?
section.para: A list of all existing Financial Accounts will be displayed.

section.title: How do I delete an existing Financial Account?
section.para: Press the 'Search' button on the Financial Account main screen
A list of all existing Financial Accounts will be displayed
Press the 'Delete' button next to the Financial Account that needs to be deleted.
